about_the_game:
- About the Game

NTR Office: A classic adventure of love and challenge!
In this story-oriented 2D pixel-art RPG, you will embark on a very emotional journey.
You work at a poorly managed pharmaceutical company, where your girlfriend is your team lead, and stands up for you when your manager tries to give you a hard time. However, that sleazy manager has been eyeing your girlfriend for a while, and has been planning to take her away from you!
The company's genius research professor, who is also your childhood friend, has also been a great help to you. However, her new assistant seems a bit suspicious...
You must navigate and choose carefully so that both your relationship and your career remain safe.
You will play a hero that protects his lover and keeps the relationship from being ruined by the owner.
Or... You can enjoy being cuckolded by your girlfriend and the manager!
The choices you make will take you to three different endings. Each decision will affect your happiness and future.

- About the Characters


Team Lead
As your superior, she does her best to make your work smooth and bearable. As your girlfriend, she also stands up for you when the manager gives you a hard time.


Doctor
As a genius doctor and your childhood friend, she tries to look out for you during work by appointing you to be the salesperson in charge when the company creates a new medicine.

- Features

More than 30 meticulously designed graphics and sex scenes provide an immersive experience.
All sex scenes have both Chinese and Japanese voiceovers.
Three different endings based on your choices: true love, cuckold, or... a mysterious ending!
If you enjoy looking at things through the eyes of someone being cuckolded, look no further!

content_descriptors.notes:
"All character depicted are over the age of 20.
Content Warning! This game contains: netorare, exhibitionism, blowjobs, violent content, sex acts and sexual assault."

name: NTR Office

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bits OS
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits OS
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: "In this story-oriented 2D pixel-art RPG, you will embark on a very emotional journey, where you must choose carefully to protect your cherished relationship. Or... You can enjoy being cuckolded by your sleazy manager!"
supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese*, English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
